name: Sweetheart frock with peek-a-boo mesh in ruby by maryjulian
description:
The perfect party frock! In a material that combines the smooth comfort and matte look of quality silk, sans the inconvenience (no dry-cleaning required!), this dress features a pretty sweetheart neckline and pleating at the bust to make the most of your assets. Fitted on one side, and with a drape on the other, this piece plays up the beauty of the female form. Tiny peek-a-boo mesh cut-outs on the sides surprise and tantalize without showing too much skin.

Channel sexy rock chick with fierce black studded boots and a leather jacket. Throw on an oversized boyfriend jacket, heavy tortoiseshell frames and chic ballet flats for a stylish work look. Up the sex appeal ever further with killer heels, smoky eyes and out-of-bed hair. Watch out, boys!

Also available in emerald and sapphire.
One size only.
PTP: 14” (16.5” at maximum stretch)
Length: Approximately 33 - 36” (asymmetric hem)

name: Shirtdress with shoulder cut-outs in cobalt by maryjulian
description:
The basic shirtdress is updated maryjulian style with ¾ length sleeves that include pleat and button details, a slim collar and concealed buttons down the front to keep the look feminine. This piece also features a slightly asymmetric hemline and cut-outs at the shoulder so you’ll never be boring. Fully lined and not sheer. 

Team with pumps and a blazer for work. Throw it over skin-tight leather pants and fierce wedges for a rock concert. Wear with ballet flats and bring a big bag to hit the stores in comfort and style. 

Also available in jade and milk.
One size only.

PTP: 18.5”
Length: Approximately 34” (asymmetric hem)
Model is 1.7m tall and fits a UK size 8.

name: Pleated hem tennis frock in smoke by maryjulian
description:
It’s layering made easy! A polyester-mix dress with a pleated chiffon hem, this unique piece features a heart-shaped neckline, and comes with a tan faux leather belt to keep the look fitted. With elasticised back and side zip for easy wearing. Fully lined and not sheer. 

Team with pumps and a blazer for a work look that’s chic and pretty at the same time. Pair with delicate strappy sandals and a light cardi for lunch with the family. Lose the belt and wear it slouchy with sneakers and a cute hat for creative flair. 

Dress made of polyester-mix; lined. Hem made of chiffon with pressed pleats.
Comes with detachable tan faux leather belt. (Black belt in pictures is stylist’s own).

Also available in rose and milk.
One size only.

PTP: 14” (18” at maximum stretch)
Length: 29” (Total length, including hem)
Model is 1.7m tall and fits a UK size 8.

name: Jumpsuit by maryjulian
description:
Pairing a tailored element with a slouchy feel, this full-length jumpsuit works both dressed up or down. With two feature buttons and the rest hidden, the look is deliberately kept clean, ready to be accessorised up or kept cool and minimal, depending on your style.

Simply throw on a smartly-cut blazer and grab a structured bag and you’re ready for work. Roll up the hems, slip into your favourite sneakers and top with a cute hat to look effortlessly casual-cool for time with the girls. Strap on killer heels, pile on the necklaces, go all sultry-smoky with your eyes, and it’s party time! 

Available in S and M sizes.

Size S
Bust (measured from pit to pit): 14 – 16” (stretchable)
Waist: 14”
Length: 51.5”

Size M
Bust (measured from pit to pit): 15 – 17” (stretchable)
Waist: 15”
Length: 51.5”

name: Cowl-back top in fresh green by maryjulian
description:
In slinky viscose and with a runch at the bust to boost and flatter your front, the back’s the killer for this top. Turn around to reveal the striking detail at the back that gives way to a sexy cowl drape.

Wear this tucked into tailored pants and with the racy back hidden for work. Team with denim cut-offs and sneakers to keep cool at a sunny picnic in the afternoon. Pair with a form-fitting pencil skirt and sky-high stilettos, and prepare to knock ‘em dead. 

Made of viscose. 
Also available in lavender and milk. 
One size only.

PTP: 18”
Length: 25” (Measured flat; includes straps)

name: Tuxedo style top in soft pink by maryjulian
description:
The perfect mix of masculine and feminine, in the comfiest stretchy cotton mix. 

It’s the tank top with a twist! A super versatile styling piece, this will soon be a wardrobe staple (and favourite!). In a cut that will flatter your shoulders and collarbone, the inspiration for this came from the classic men’s tuxedo jacket, with a slight nod to the cummerbund as well!

Wear this with sharply tailored, wide-legged pants and stacked pumps for work. Swap the pants for distressed jeans, a little sequinned jacket and sex kitten heels for a night out. Try it with your favourite denim cut-offs and combat boots for kicking back with the pals over the weekend.

Made of cotton Lycra mix.
Also available in midnight blue and cream.
One size only.

PTP: 15.5” (When unstretched) 
Waist: 23”

name: Layered chiffon top in dusty pink by maryjulian
description:
Part soft and part structured, layers of chiffon rule this top. Sleeves have a subtle flutter effect for softness. Darts down the back of the top give subtle definition to your curves. Double lined in quality chiffon, with side zip for easy wearing.

Pair with smartly tailored pants and a structured doctor’s bag for work. Swap the pants for a pair of well-worn jeans and ballet flats for shopping over the weekend. Throw on a pretty skirt and your favourite scent for time with the boyfriend.

Made of quality chiffon. 
Also available in soft grey. 
Available in S and M sizes.

Size S
PTP: 17”
Waist: 14”
Length: 23.5 – 25.5 (Slightly curved hem)

Size M
PTP:18”
Waist: 15”
Length: 23.5 – 25.5 (Slightly curved hem)

name: Shimmer frock in slate shimmer by maryjulian
description:
In a very flattering shift-like cut, this dress is classic and timeless from the front. Turn to the side and a flash of bare skin surprises; you'll definitely garner a second look as they'll want to see the back. And it doesn't disappoint; with cut-away sides leaving just a long, slim, racerback line, and miles of sexy shoulder and back on show. With functional front pockets so you can play the oh-I-just-threw-this-on It girl, a long back zip, and slightly elasticised sides to ensure a perfect fit.

The shimmer makes this the perfect party frock; just the thing for a night of dancing! Work the classic cut of the frock by pairing with a strong-shouldered blazer for the boardroom - it also hides the alluring back! Or go understatedly pretty for weekend brunch with the family with a light cardi and ballet flats.

Also available in nude shimmer and onyx shimmer.

One size only.
PTP: 13" - 16.5" 
Length: 33"

description:

name: Flare-sleeved silk tee in ivory by maryjulian
description:
With the luxurious feel of silk, without the crazy cost and need to be dry-cleaned, this top has that same wonderful softness and ‘flow’ that looks great both left out as well as tucked in. Featuring dropped-shoulders that flare out slightly into flattering soft sleeves, a wide hem and neckline, and 5 black faux precious stones at the neckline for interest.

Pair with wide-legged pants and a structured doctor’s bag for work. Swap the pants for cute printed shorts and a bowler hat for time with the girls. Go all slouchy-stylish with dress pants, killer heels and smoky eyes for that hot date. 

Made of synthetic silk. 
Also available in sapphire. 
One size only.

PTP: 19.5”
Length: 19.5”

name: Flare-sleeved silk tee in sapphire by maryjulian
description:
With the luxurious feel of silk, without the crazy cost and need to be dry-cleaned, this top has that same wonderful softness and ‘flow’ that looks great both left out as well as tucked in. Featuring dropped-shoulders that flare out slightly into flattering soft sleeves, a wide hem and neckline, and 5 black faux precious stones at the neckline for interest.

Pair with wide-legged pants and a structured doctor’s bag for work. Swap the pants for cute printed shorts and a bowler hat for time with the girls. Go all slouchy-stylish with dress pants, killer heels and smoky eyes for that hot date. 

Black camisole worn under is stylist's own.
Made of synthetic silk.

PTP: 19.5”
Length: 19.5”
Model is 1.7m tall and a UK size 8.

name: Flutter sleeve frock in jet black by maryjulian
description:
In a material that combines the smooth comfort and matte look of quality silk, sans the inconvenience (no dry-cleaning required!), and in a heavier drape to make the most of the hourglass silhouette of the dress. Featuring flutter sleeves in the lightest of chiffon, keyhole closure detail and elasticised waistline at the back, and side zip for easy wearing. A square neckline keeps the look from being overly girly, and perfectly juxtaposes the feminine feel of the frock.

Hide the pretty flutter sleeves under a smart blazer to play up the strong lines of the dress for a corporate look that tells everyone you mean business. Lose the blazer and play up the fluttery air by wearing it with dainty pumps and a pretty little purse. Or go all fashionista and wear with smokey eyes, fierce, studded, sky-high wedges, and the bag of the season.

Belt not included.
Also available in midnight blue and pale pink.

One size only.
PTP: 17"
Waist: 12.5" - 15.5" 
Length: 32"

description:

name: Mesh-trimmed shorts in taupe by maryjulian
description:
In a soft, smooth synthetic that falls in a flattering, slightly A-line cut, this hard-worker will take you places. Featuring a row of darts down both the front and back to ensure the best fit to your curves, front zip and hook closure, and mesh trim at the hem for a little flirty twist.

Wear with a floaty, feminine blouse and pretty Mary Janes for the right mix of sweet girl-next-door with a hint of sexy for a date. Tuck a worn-out tee into them and wear with your favourite pair of sneakers to look effortlessly stylish.  Team with a black corset and killer strappy wedges to knock ‘em dead on that night out.

Available in S and M sizes.

Size S
Waist: 13.5” (Curved waistband; measured on the curve)
Length: 10” 

Size M
Waist: 14.5” (Curved waistband; measured on the curve)
Length: 10.5

name: Floaty chiffon frock in noir by maryjulian
description:
Featuring a soft drape-front collar with double button key-hole closure at the nape, triple-lined circle skirt, soft box-pleats below the front and back neckline, and a banded (non-elasticised) drop-waist.

Feel like an angel in this beautiful number. Twirl around like you used to when you were a little girl, and feel the layers of chiffon float about you. You’ll feel like you’re walking on air with every step you take. Fall in love. We did.
 
Made of superior quality soft chiffon. 
Also available in blanc.

One size only.
PTP: 18” (21” stretched)
Hip band: 18”
Length: 33”

name: Floaty chiffon frock in blanc by maryjulian
description:
Featuring a soft, drape-front collar with double button key-hole closure at the nape; double-lined, draped bodice; soft box-pleats below the front and back neckline; triple-lined, full circle skirt; and a banded (non-elasticised) drop-waist.

Feel like an angel in this beautiful number. Twirl around like you used to when you were a little girl, and feel the layers of chiffon float about you. You’ll feel like you’re walking on air with every step you take. Fall I n love. We did.

Made of superior quality soft chiffon. 
Also available in noir.

One size only.
PTP: 18” (21” stretched)
Hip band: 18”
Length: 33”

(Note: Material is slightly sheer; nude undergarments advised for this design in blanc.)

name: Pixie double tiered frock in cobalt blue
description:
It’s a basic frock with a twist! Featuring two tiers, with a unique pixie-like hemline.

Go rock-glam with fierce platform heels and a studded clutch for a night out, or dress it down with pretty strappy flats and a straw hat for a more delicate daytime look.

Made of heavy structured cotton.
Also available in pale pink.

One size only.
PTP: 17”
Length: 32”

name: Pixie double tiered frock in pale pink
description:

name: Slashed neckline shift minidress in hot pink
description:
This is one for all the edgy girls! It’s the classic and universally flattering shift dress, updated with a slash across the neckline, and a shortened hem.

Keep it simple and clean ala a modern Jackie O with classic pumps; throw on a pair of heavy combat boots for that I’m-with-the-band look; or up the allure factor with sexy sky-high strappies for that hot date. The possibilities are endless.

Made of heavy structured cotton.
Also available in kohl.

One size only.
PTP: 16”
Length: 31”

name: Layered-collar blouse with pleat detail in milk
description:
Not your typical short-sleeved shirt; this top is more of a blouse in its feminine details.  Extremely comfortable and versatile. Button-down blouse with unique, double layered collar detail. Slight puff sleeves and subtle pleating near the front neckline, at the sleeves, and across the back keep the look dainty.

Go pretty with a light-coloured silk bottom and delicate strappy sandals; go all-out lady tucked into a form-fitting pencil skirt with killer heels; or contrast with structured, menswear-inspired trousers.

Made of soft cotton.

One size only.
PTP: 20”
Length: 24”

name: Mandarin collar tunic with button detail in pink
description:
Featuring a Mandarin collar, cuffed sleeves, breast pockets, and subtle military-inspired button detail at the shoulder.
 
Go edgy – lose the sash and throw it on as a loose tunic with cigarette pants and combat boots. Go flirty by wearing as a minidress– cinch in the waist and pair with pretty pumps. Or go quirky by tucking into cute, cuffed shorts worn with sneakers or Oxfords; suspenders and bucket hat optional!

Comes with a thin sash in the same material.
Difference in colour is due to pictures being taken with and without flash in order to capture the truest colour.
True colour of the item is slightly duller than the darker pictured shade.

Made of structured cotton. 
Also available in blue.

One size only.
Pit to pit: 18.5”
Down: 30”

name: Registered Mail
